chip_configs.name: Apple M3 chip
chip_configs.description: M3 brings serious speed and capability to blaze through everyday activities, multitask across apps and video calls, and handle elaborate content in pro apps and games
points: Run multiple apps, speed through thousands of photos
Configure with up to 24GB unified memory
